title: How to Find Brands That Align with Your Content
excerpt: Learn how to find brands that align with your content in 2025 using Newcollab’s matching tools.
content:
Introduction

Partnering with brands that don’t share your values can damage your authenticity and alienate your audience. In 2025, Newcollab’s matching tools make it easy to find brands

1. Define Your Content Values

Start by clarifying what your content stands for. Are you passionate about sustainability, inclusivity, or innovation? Defining your values helps you attract brands with similar goals.

How to Define Values

  • Write a Mission Statement: Summarize your content’s purpose in 1–2 sentences.
  • Analyze Your Audience: Use Newcollab’s analytics to understand what your followers care about.
  • Reflect Your Niche: Ensure your values align with your niche (e.g., eco-friendly travel).

2. Use Newcollab’s Matching Tools

Newcollab’s platform uses advanced algorithms to match you with brands based on shared values, audience demographics, and content style. Filter brands by industry, values, or campaign goals to find perfect fits. Explore more about building partnerships.

'Newcollab found me eco-friendly brands that perfectly match my content!'

- Maya S., Eco Creator

3. Research Brand Campaigns

Before pitching, explore a brand’s campaign history on Newcollab. Check their past collaborations to ensure they align with your values and have a track record of fair partnerships.

Research Tips

  • Review Campaign Goals: Look for brands focused on causes you support.
  • Check Creator Feedback: Newcollab’s reviews show how brands treat creators.
  • Assess Authenticity: Avoid brands with inauthentic or controversial campaigns.

4. Pitch Authentically

Craft pitches that highlight shared values, using Newcollab’s templates. Explain how your content aligns with the brand’s mission and how your audience will benefit. Authenticity in your pitch builds trust and increases approval chances.

Conclusion

Finding brands that align with your content is crucial for authentic partnerships. Newcollab’s matching tools, analytics, and templates make the process seamless. Start connecting with brands that share your values today!
